actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation
Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to enact existing regulatory provisions governing Multiple Award Schedule ordering and to enhance competition in Federal agency procurements of supplies and services under Multiple Award Schedules.
short_title: Multiple Award Schedule Procurement Improvement Act of 1991

summary.text: Multiple Award Schedule Procurement Improvement Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to: (1) codify current regulatory requirements for ordering from Multiple Award Schedules; and (2) require price negotiations with a sufficient number of schedule vendors for orders over $1,000, to the maximum extent practicable, to ensure competition.

titles.title: Multiple Award Schedule Procurement Improvement Act of 1991

To amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to enact existing regulatory provisions governing Multiple Award Schedule ordering and to enhance competition in Federal agency procurements of supplies and services under Multiple Award Schedules.
